mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tb_product (writer, prdt_name, prdt_desc, prdt_desc_detail, prdt_regdate, prdt_opendate, prdt_enddate, prdt_goal, prdt_open, prdt_desc_policy) VALUES (#{writer}, #{prdt_name}, #{prdt_desc}, #{prdt_desc_detail}, now(), #{prdt_opendate}, #{prdt_enddate}, #{prdt_goal}, #{prdt_open}, #{prdt_desc_policy} )
